TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A rare cancer that forms in the part of the urethra that is closest to the outside of the body. The cancer often has not spread deeply into the tissue.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "distal urethral cancer"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de uretra distal"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cáncer poco frecuente que se forma en la parte de la uretra más cercana al exterior del cuerpo. A menudo, el cáncer se disemina de manera profunda en el tejido.
